  • Field Details

    • myValue

      private double myValue

  • Constructor Details

    • SLogoVariable

      public SLogoVariable​(java.lang.String name)
      All Tokens must be initialized with a name, which is almost always the contents of the String that is being converted into a Token. For Variable objects, this name will act as the name of the variable. If no value is specified, then value will be set to null.
      Parameters:
      name - - the specified name of the variable

    • SLogoVariable

      public SLogoVariable​(java.lang.String name, double value)
      Initializes a Variable with a name and value. Used most often when the user declares a variable, as a Variable object will be created and then placed in the Workspace.
      Parameters:
      name - - the specified name of the variable
      value - - the specified numeric value of the variable

  • Method Details

      Allows Command or Function objects to access a variable's value.
